title: LyneyMagic
author: LyneyMagic
content: Hi! Residing in Europe, need platforms that can cash out crypto to FIAT (EUR, USD). Possibly with a card. Already have WIREX, but an alternative and personal recommendation would be goodThanks

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: There are many crypto exchanges that you can use in Europe. You can go through lists of exchanges on Coingecko and research more to know the ones that support your country. https://www.coingecko.com/en/exchangesYou can use Bybit, eToro, Coinbase, Kraken, Crypto.com and many other exchanges in Europe.

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: If you're looking for debit cards similar to Wirex, then you can look into this list: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5280997.0Alternatively, maybe you could just grab some popular cards like Wise or Revolut and do P2P trading on Binance, you will be saving on fees that way too. Binance doesn't have any escrow fees, and neither do the card providers I mentioned (not when dealing with someone who uses them anyway).

comments.author: metoci
comments.body: Best crypto to fait services in uk 2024.eToro – Overall best cryptocurrency exchange with 70+ cryptos and low fees.Coinbase – Popular crypto exchange for beginners – Debit cards supported.Kraken – Popular cryptocurrency exchange that has never faced a major security breach.MEXC – Leading exchange offers 0% spot trading fees.Gate.io – Trade over 1,400 cryptocurrencies online or via an iOS/Android app.PrimeXBT – Use crypto copy trading or trade crypto futures with no minimum deposit.KuCoin – Leading crypto exchange with over 700 cryptocurrencies and 0.1% spot fees.Margex – Trade Bitcoin with up to 100x leverage and get high staking yields on multiple cryptos.Bitrue – Trade 700+ cryptos and access high staking yields and cryptocurrency loans.Bitget – Popular crypto exchange supporting 600+ cryptos with low trading fees.Pionex – Trade cryptos with an automated trading bot and get high staking returns.Gemini – Interest on crypto holdings from audited and regulated exchange.

comments.author: Pandorak
comments.body: Quote from: metoci on April 03, 2024, 09:55:05 PM[...]KuCoin – Leading crypto exchange with over 700 cryptocurrencies and 0.1% spot fees.[...]Bitrue – Trade 700+ cryptos and access high staking yields and cryptocurrency loans.[...]Don't go there, because currently they are in a case [1], some time ago many users mass withdrew their balances from KuCoin. Also don't go to Bitrue, they have a bad rating on Trustpilot [2], and a month ago our local guy had a problem with a withdrawal he made of $57,000, Bitrue froze his account for no clear reason [3].The tweet is written in Bahasa Indonesia, but you can use a translation tool to find out what it means.[1] https://cointelegraph.com/news/justice-department-charges-kucoin-money-laundering[2] https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.bitrue.com[3] https://twitter.com/mrstp__/status/1765339053065637964
